title: Strengthening CS Competencies in Practice: Attitude Analysis of ChatGPT Utilization for Pre-Service Physics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the educational applicability of ChatGPT across five dimensions: assessment, design, information utilization, problem-solving, and time efficiency.
Learners can understand and interpret the basic structure of an attitude measurement model using PLS-SEM.
Learners can propose three or more creative instructional strategies for integrating AI tools into physics lessons.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
